vehicleType.describes: The type of vehicle, for e.g, hopper, compactor, tipper, dumper

status.describes: Status of the vehicle, whether it's Active or InActive

dateTime.describes: location updated dateTime string in yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

battteryStatus.describes: Battery status of the reporting device, Connected or Disconnected

latitude.describes: Latitude where the vehicle is at

longitude.describes: Longitude where the vehicle is at

coverageRegion.describes: Region of operation of the garbage collection service
